poem.title: Oranges and Lemons
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: P is for piss from drinking Builders' tea, the tanner! Guacamolic Mushy pea - no: plural, peas, and Chips or cantos to your fishy Chanties. Lodge a plea, incontinent With the old bay leaf or lea: Belle of Shoreditch Is a clarty old bitch.
